name: A Visualization of COVID-19 Deaths
description:
A small project to show the scale of COVID-19 deaths. Each death is represented by a single coffin placed into the desert. Selecting a country from the menu will show current total deaths recorded.

The visualisation is uses up-to-date data from the COVID-19 API (https://covid19api.com). An internet connection is required.

Controls
Mouse/WASD for movement
Keys 1 to 4 will jump you to various positions on the map
F will switch the camera to a slow flyover
Escape open and closes the menu
